data.name: Unsecured Business Loan
data.description: Our offering to help your business in challenging times

features.additionalInfo: 3-year term with option to defer payments for 6 months

eligibility.additionalInfo: Registered for GST with a turnover over $75,000 per annum

A business entity domiciled in Australia or an individual 18 years and above or strata corporation domiciled in Australia and requires the funding for business or investment purposes other than investment in residential property
Operating as a sole trader or a sole director company (where the sole director is also the sole company secretary). For company borrowers, the sole director must supply a director's guarantee
Your business has less than $1.5m in existing business lending with Westpac.
All your ATO payments, loan repayments and employee entitlements (incl. super) are up to date.
Customer is an existing business customer
Traded for at least 12 months with a valid ABN or ACN

If you're a Westpac customer with conditional approval, applying is simple. All you need to do is sign into Online Banking.If you are not sure about conditonal approval, please sign into Online Banking and check the Overview tab or the business products menu. If you have conditional approval, it will be shown there.

If you're a Westpac customer without conditional approval, you can still apply online if you meet the below requirements. You'll need to:  Be able to sign into Westpac Online Banking. Also have a business account with ANZ, Bank of Melbourne, BankSA, Bankwest, Commonwealth Bank, NAB or St.George and use Online Banking . Connect your Xero cloud accounting software.If you are not sure about conditional approval, please sign into Online Banking and check the Overview tab or the business products menu. If you have conditional approval, it will be shown there.

discounts.description: New Business Loan Establishment Fee Waiver
discounts.additionalInfo: $0 establishment fee on new business loans on applications before 31 March 2023. Credit criteria and T&Cs apply.
